about_the_game:
About This Game

A new twist on the tried and true top-down coop formula, Elemental Fury is a spiritual successor to many

legendary games of the genre. Combining the mythos of the far east and the Kung-Fu movies of the old, Elemental

Fury strives to give the players a unique co-op experience.


4 Unique Characters

Four unique characters each with the power of a single element: Fire, Water, Air, and Stone. Combine your elemental

powers with other players to manifest destructive combos.


Online and Couch Co-op Play


Explore the ancient far east alone or play with others online or in 4 players same-screen couch co-op. Beware

of the friendly fire!


A New Experience


A new take on the top-down co-op action games with hand-built maps and foes inspired by the legends of the

ancient far east. Hold your ground against hordes of mythical beasts and fierce warriors of the legends alone or

with other players to unleash the Elemental Fury!

Recommended:

short_description: Elemental Fury is a 4 player co-op action game inspired by the mythical setting of the ancient far east. Battle the waves after waves of legendary enemies with your friends for survival and treasures in online and hot-seat multiplayer.
